docs.text: time bandits , from director terry gilliam , is a very different fantasy action/adventure movie about a group of time-traveling dwarves , led by randall ( david rappaport ) , who have stolen a map of the universe .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this map contains time hole , that , if exploited , enable the men to travel back and forth through time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the supreme being of the universe ( ralph richardson ) is the former employer of these treasure-seeking bandits , and he wishes desperately to regain the map . .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: during the travels , he appears as a ghostly face , demanding that they return the map that they have stolen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but , according to randall , they are just " borrowing " it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kevin , a young boy who seems quite bored with his life , is unexpectedly brought into the schemes of the little men when they appear in his room , which has a portal for time traveling .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he joins up with the men and becomes part of their gang , following them on their robberies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: their first victim is napoleon ( ian holm ) , whom they rob during a battle that he is commanding .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: from here , the group travels to the middle ages , meeting up with robin hood himself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: eventually , kevin is separated from the group and travels to an egyptian time where he is taken in by king agamemnon , played by sean connery .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kevin accidentally saved the king's life , and the king wishes to have kevin as his son .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but the group of bandits find kevin and transport onto the deck of the titanic .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: meanwhile , the evil genius ( david warner ) is watching the group from fortress of ultimate darkness , attempting to find a way in order to bring the men , and the map , to him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when randall learns of the fortress of ultimate darkness , which supposedly contains " the most fabulous object in the world " , the dollar signs seemingly appear on his eyes , as he is convinced that they must travel there .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: once inside the fortress of ultimate darkness , it is unclear as to if any of the men will make it out alive .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: time bandits is a fantastically made film that caters to the imagination of anyone .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with a terrific soundtrack , courtesy of george harrison , whom also was an executive producer , time bandits is sure to be a very surrealistic , time-traveling adventure with unforgettable characters that is sure to entertain anyone .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: terry gilliam , however , does not utilize that greatly his trademark ability in moviemaking during this film , although this does not affect the film that greatly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and finally , if you liked labyrinth , you'll love time bandits .
docs.label: positive
